title: Please help an unknown directx error has occurred and league of legends cannot start
body: I keep trying to fix it but nothing works. My video card isn't the issue and I have the newest direct X so what is the problem? Also I can attach my logs but I do not know which ones I am supposed to use.

replies.body: Even though you have the newest directx, there might still be something weird happening with how it was installed. Check out the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), as the troubleshooting steps there should be able to narrow down what exactly is going wrong.

Alas none of those things worked, Oh but I couldnt disable the debug version of direct X. I tried to type in what it said into the windows search but nothing came up. I have the newest direct X and windows 7

No worries! Even though that guide didn't solve the problem, it does help us narrow down what's really going on. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can do a lot more one on one troubleshooting to get this fixed quicker!
